<bo>.name: bo
<bo>.info: <bo> is a well-groomed, medium-sized Shiba Inu with a thick, cinnamon-colored coat, cream accents, alert eyes, and a black collar.

<brown-duck>.name: brown-duck
<brown-duck>.info: <brown-duck> is a brown, plush duck toy with a green head, an yellow beak and feet, and a white stripe around its neck.

<butin>.name: butin
<butin>.info: <butin> is a husky, lying on its back with its paws in the air and its eyes closed. The husky has a white and brown coat.

<cat-cup>.name: cat-cup
<cat-cup>.info: <cat-cup> is a white ceramic mug with a cat face design. The mug has a handle on the side.

<chua-thien-mu>.name: chua-thien-mu
<chua-thien-mu>.info: <chua-thien-mu> is a tall, octagonal pagoda with a pointed roof. The pagoda is made of gray and red stone and has a series of windows and decorative elements.

<ciin>.name: ciin
<ciin>.info: <ciin> is a young woman with long blonde hair, wearing a white sleeveless shirt. She has bright red lipstick and light makeup.

<denisdang>.name: denisdang
<denisdang>.info: <denisdang> is a man with white hair and a pink and grey sweater.

<dragon>.name: dragon
<dragon>.info: <dragon> is a pink and yellow plush toy in the shape of a dragon. It has a blue wing and yellow spots on its body.

<duck-banana>.name: duck-banana
<duck-banana>.info: <duck-banana> is a large, white, plush toy shaped like a duck with an orange beak, feet, and a yellow chest.

<dug>.name: dug
<dug>.info: <dug> is a golden retriever from the movie Up. He has a brown coat and a big, goofy smile, wearing a collar with some round objects.

<elephant>.name: elephant
<elephant>.info: <elephant> is a grey plush elephant toy with large ears and feet. The ears are ribbed and have a lighter gray trim. The feet are ribbed with a cream colored trim.

<fire>.name: fire
<fire>.info: <fire> is an animated female character made of fire, with a fiery red hair, black dress with paisley pattern and angry expression.

<henry>.name: henry
<henry>.info: <henry> is a grey and white dosmetic cat with green eyes and a long black tail.

<khanhvy>.name: khanhvy
<khanhvy>.info: <khanhvy> is a young woman with long black hair tied in a ponytail. She is smiling and wearing glasses.

<lamb>.name: lamb
<lamb>.info: <lamb> is a white plush toy shaped like a lamb with red feet.

<mam>.name: mam
<mam>.info: <mam> is a fluffy, gray British Shorthair cat with white accents and yellow eyes, sitting on a wood floor. It has a white patch on its chest and a long tail.

<marie-cat>.name: marie-cat
<marie-cat>.info: <marie-cat> is a white kitten with blue eyes and a pink collar and bow.

<mydieu>.name: mydieu
<mydieu>.info: <mydieu> is a dosmetic ginger cat with big, yellow eyes and a pink collar.

<neurips-cup>.name: neurips-cup
<neurips-cup>.info: <neurips-cup> is a blue mug with a white rim.

<nha-tho-hanoi>.name: nha-tho-hanoi
<nha-tho-hanoi>.info: <nha-tho-hanoi> is a large, gray stone church with two tall towers and a cross on top. The church is decorated with red and gold trim.

<nha-tho-hcm>.name: nha-tho-hcm
<nha-tho-hcm>.info: <nha-tho-hcm> is a church with two tall spires and a statue of a woman in front of it. The church is made of brown brick and has a gray roof. The statue is made of gray stone.

<oong>.name: oong
<oong>.info: <oong> is a smiling Asian man with short black hair, wearing glasses and a grey sweater.

<phuc-map>.name: phuc-map
<phuc-map>.info: <phuc-map> is a bald man with a red beard.

<pig-cup>.name: pig-cup
<pig-cup>.info: <pig-cup> is a pink ceramic mug shaped like a pig with peach-shaped ears and a peach on top as a lid. It has a handle on one side.

<pusheen-cup>.name: pusheen-cup
<pusheen-cup>.info: <pusheen-cup> is a cute grey mug shaped as a cat with pointed ears, featuring two black stripes on its head.

<shiba-black>.name: shiba-black
<shiba-black>.info: <shiba-black> is a black Shiba Inu Dog shaped plush toy. It is round and has a tan belly.

<shiba-gray>.name: shiba-gray
<shiba-gray>.info: <shiba-gray> is a gray Shiba Inu Dog shaped plush toy. It is a long, cylindrical shape with a white face and chest. It is round and has large, black eyes and a small, black nose.

<shiba-sleep>.name: shiba-sleep
<shiba-sleep>.info: <shiba-sleep> is a long, plush Shiba Inu Dog toy. It is light brown with white accents, has a fluffy tail curled up, and has white paw pads.

<shiba-yellow>.name: shiba-yellow
<shiba-yellow>.info: <shiba-yellow> is a brown and white plush toy dog with black eyes. The toy looks like a Shiba Inu.

<thao>.name: thao
<thao>.info: <thao> is a young woman with long black hair, wearing glasses and a white shirt.

<thap-but>.name: thap-but
<thap-but>.info: <thap-but> is a tall, gray stone pagoda with a pointed top standing on a pile of rocks. It has five levels, each with a square window.

<thap-cham>.name: thap-cham
<thap-cham>.info: <thap-cham> is a red brick tower, a Cham temple with a pointed archway and small doorways. You can also walk inside to visit.

<thuytien>.name: thuytien
<thuytien>.info: <thuytien> is a woman with long black hair and a black lace top.

<tokyo-keyboard>.name: tokyo-keyboard
<tokyo-keyboard>.info: <tokyo-keyboard> is a small, pink keyboard with white keycaps. The keyboard has a cherry blossom design on it and some of the keys have custom keycaps with different designs.

<toodles-galore>.name: toodles-galore
<toodles-galore>.info: <toodles-galore> is a white cat, and she is wearing a purple bow around her neck.

<viruss>.name: viruss
<viruss>.info: <viruss> is a young man with dark hair. He is wearing black-framed glasses and holding a phone.

<water>.name: water
<water>.info: <water> is a blue, humanoid, water-like figure with a purple and white striped shirt. He is transparent and appears to be in a water-based world.

<willinvietnam>.name: willinvietnam
<willinvietnam>.info: <willinvietnam> is a young man with black hair.

<yellow-duck>.name: yellow-duck
<yellow-duck>.info: <yellow-duck> is a yellow, plush duck with large, black eyes and a wide, flat beak.

<yuheng>.name: yuheng
<yuheng>.info: <yuheng> is a young Asian man wearing glasses.
